texts.value: Acts as a positive regulator of apoptosis. Also acts as a regulator of cellular reactive oxygen species
Inhibited by thiazolidinedione-type compounds: inhibited by furan- and pyridone- thiazolidinediones
Highly expressed in placenta. Lower levels in heart, lung, skeletal muscle, kidney and pancreas
Directly regulated by p53/TP53: induced following cisplatin treatment in a p53/TP53-dependent manner. p53/TP53 activates expression by directly binding to its regulatory regions
Belongs to the protein kinase superfamily. CAMK Ser/Thr protein kinase family. DAP kinase subfamily

features.description: Loss of activity and of apoptotic function.
